description: A small pouch that can be used to store most types of small ammunition; rockets, however, will not fit.  Use insert to store ammunition.
A fabric ammo bag worn at the waist.  It is capable of holding a single large magazine close at hand.
A fabric ammo pouch that can be strapped to your chest and hold a single magazine close at hand.

Popularized during the Vietnam War, chest rigs like these are typically plain, barebones affairs consisting of three or more pouches in a row, with straps to secure them on your chest.  This one can hold four magazines in its pouches.

variants.description: Popularized during the Vietnam War, chest rigs like these are typically plain, barebones affairs consisting of three or more pouches in a row, with straps to secure them on your chest.  This one can hold four magazines in its pouches.
An American flag is proudly embroidered across the front of each pouch, with a tiny, eagle-winged .50-caliber bullet crowning each banner.

description: An open medieval-looking bag, designed to store javelins within easy reach.
A small fabric ammo pouch that can be strapped to your ankle and hold a single small magazine close at hand.
A fabric ammo pouch that can be strapped to your leg and hold two magazines close at hand.
A leather quiver worn at the waist that can hold 20 arrows or bolts.  Use insert to store arrows or bolts.
A lighter and more durable quiver made of nylon, with straps to attach to a MOLLE system.
A quiver woven from strips of birch bark, worn at the waist, that can hold 20 arrows or bolts.  Use insert to store arrows or bolts.
A makeshift quiver fashioned from a pipe, worn at the waist.  Heavier and thinner than a typical quiver, it can only hold 10 arrows or bolts.  Use insert to store arrows or bolts.

A large leather quiver trimmed with metal, worn on the back, that can hold 60 arrows or bolts.  Historically used by horse archers, rather than foot archers, but neither of THEM had to fight zombies.  Use insert to store arrows or bolts.
A large quiver woven from strips of birchbark, worn on the back, that can hold 60 arrows or bolts.  Use insert to store arrows or bolts.
A large makeshift quiver fashioned from 3 pipes, worn on the back.  Heavier and thinner than a typical large quiver, it can only hold 30 arrows or bolts.  Use insert to store arrows or bolts.

A large cotton quiver capable of easily storing 16 arrows.  It includes a bag and straps to store a takedown bow, as well as a small pouch for archery accessories.  Use insert to store arrows or bolts and activate to holster/draw your bow.
This light vest is meant to carry your magazines, shells and pistols.  They are popular amongst law enforcement, but less so than combination tactical vests incorporating Kevlar.

This lightweight harness covered in MOLLE webbing is designed to attach a few pouches, holsters and other PALS compatible accessories.  Preferred by some soldiers over directly attaching accessories to a ballistic vest as they can then be easily separated.

This vest covered in MOLLE webbing is designed to attach pouches, holsters and other PALS compatible accessories.  Preferred by some soldiers over directly attaching accessories to a ballistic vest as they can then be easily separated.

This vest covered in MOLLE webbing is designed to attach pouches, holsters and other PALS compatible accessories.  Preferred by some soldiers over directly attaching accessories to a ballistic vest as they can then be easily separated.  This one has a single point sling wrapped around the shoulders using a system to keep your weapon extra secure.

pocket_data.//: volume encumber set high since the whole vest is already scaled. This equals .4 overall

description: This massive vest covered in MOLLE webbing is designed to attach a large number of pouches, holsters and other PALS compatible accessories.  Preferred by some soldiers over directly attaching accessories to a ballistic vest as they can then be easily separated.

name.str: heavy load bearing vest with sling
name.str_pl: heavy load bearing vests with slings

description: This massive vest covered in MOLLE webbing is designed to attach a large number of pouches, holsters and other PALS compatible accessories.  Preferred by some soldiers over directly attaching accessories to a ballistic vest as they can then be easily separated.  This one has a single point sling wrapped around the shoulders using a system to keep your weapon extra secure.

pocket_data.//: volume encumber set high since the whole vest is already scaled. This equals .4 overall

description: This massive vest covered in MOLLE webbing is designed to attach a large number of pouches, holsters and other PALS compatible accessories.  This one has a single point sling wrapped around the shoulders using a system to keep your weapon extra secure, as well as a set of strong magnets attached to the torso and waist to hold a breaching shotgun.

volume encumber set high since the whole vest is already scaled. This equals .4 overall

description: A pouch designed to keep your radio accessible and secure.  Has MOLLE straps for attaching to a belt or vest.
A pouch designed to keep gadgets and small items accessible and secure.  Has MOLLE straps for attaching to a belt or vest.
A pouch designed to hold a water bottle with an additional front tactical pocket.  Has MOLLE straps for attaching to a belt or vest.
A pouch designed to keep your canteen accessible and secure.  Has MOLLE straps for attaching to a belt or vest.
A low profile pouch designed to keep your tools accessible and secure.  Has MOLLE straps for attaching to a vest or can be strapped directly to your chest.

//: stats taken from: https://www.patriotoutfitters.com/condor-flashlight-pouch?PMSRCH=MOLLE%20GEAR liberties were taken with this one so it would hold either flashlight
description: A tiny pouch designed to keep your flashlight accessible and secure.  Has MOLLE straps for attaching to a belt or vest.
A sturdy holster designed to be worn vertically, to keep a small profile on a tactical vest.  This makes it a little more awkward to draw from than a normal holster.

//: stats taken from: https://condoroutdoor.com/ma11.html this one is much larger than an in game gas mask so I've take some liberties on size
description: A large pouch capable of holding a gas mask and an additional filter, keeping both accessible and secure.  Has MOLLE straps for attaching to a belt or vest.

pocket_data.//: gas masks don't seem to have lengths currently

description: A pouch designed to hold one military grenade, keeping it both accessible and secure.  Has MOLLE straps for attaching to a belt or vest.

A collection of 6 pockets, 3 wide and 2 deep, designed to hold rifle magazines and keep them accessible and secure.  Has MOLLE straps for attaching to a vest or can be strapped directly to your chest.
A pouch designed to hold shotgun shells or .308 rounds, keeping them accessible and secure.  Has MOLLE straps for attaching to a belt or vest.
A massive handmade imitation of a proper ballistic vest for abnormally large folks.  Large and heavy, but will still fit under an abnormally large coat.
A sturdy leather ammo bag worn at the waist.  It is capable of holding a single large magazine close at hand.
A leather ammo pouch that can be strapped to your chest and hold a single magazine close at hand.
A MOLLE-compatible loop for attaching small tools to a load-bearing vest.
A MOLLE-compatible loop for attaching tools and some weapons to a load-bearing vest.
A MOLLE-compatible loop for attaching large tools and weapons to a load-bearing vest.
